issue.title: begin/end for arrays should be constexpr and noexcept

discussion.p: The array forms of std::begin and std::end should be constexpr and noexcept.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N3691.

blockquote.pre: template <class T, size_t N> constexpr T* begin(T (&array)[N]) noexcept;
template <class T, size_t N> constexpr T* end(T (&array)[N]) noexcept;
